app.name: TinyLoad
app.long_description:
Region-free original game launcher in 4096 bytes
Controls: None. Just wait for the game to load.
User interface: There is a progress bar across the screen. If a detectable error occurs, a portion of the top of the screen will turn red. TinyLoad will then attempt to relaunch HBC.
Supported features: - Region free - Proper PPC time setting - Should autodetect video mode - Launches proper IOS - Progress bar
